argumentText:
ARGUMENT
r

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isprrng.1 | |- G = ( 1st ` R ) |
| 2 |  | isprrng.2 | |- Z = ( GId ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( r = R -> ( 1st ` r ) = ( 1st ` R ) ) |
| 4 | 3, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( r = R -> ( 1st ` r ) = G ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( r = R -> ( GId ` ( 1st ` r ) ) = ( GId ` G ) ) |
| 6 | 5, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( r = R -> ( GId ` ( 1st ` r ) ) = Z ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_sneqd | |- ( r = R -> { ( GId ` ( 1st ` r ) ) } = { Z } ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( r = R -> ( PrIdl ` r ) = ( PrIdl ` R ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_eleq12d | |- ( r = R -> ( { ( GId ` ( 1st ` r ) ) } e. ( PrIdl ` r ) <-> { Z } e. ( PrIdl ` R ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_df-prrngo | |- PrRing = { r e. RingOps | { ( GId ` ( 1st ` r ) ) } e. ( PrIdl ` r ) } |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( R e. PrRing <-> ( R e. RingOps /\ { Z } e. ( PrIdl ` R ) ) ) |
